ygData.subject: Re: Mistmoore Castle
ygData.msgSnippet: Madagan, Some very good level 40 + friends helped me get the quest lute, the Lute of the Gypsy Princess, and the MM Battle drum all in one  night. :) We headed
ygData.messageBody:
Madagan,
Some very good level 40 + friends helped me get the quest lute, the Lute of
the Gypsy Princess, and the MM Battle drum all in one night. :)
We headed for the bedroom where the maid spawns-had to evac only once and
was there 3 hours. Our puller really knew the place well, and 90% of the
time only pulled one mob. The music room is where the gypsy musicians are
found, and you can see the lute on them-but if you pull to the maids room
you have a great chance to avoid the nasty trains-also the firstt thing we
did on arriving was to invis all the way to the kitchen,and clear that room
first-then head to the maids room-hope this helps.
Scanna
Bertoxx
(snip)-All I need to know is was I in the right
> place to get the lute, who drops it and is it a rare drop?
>
> Many Thanks
>
> Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 35 Songs - Veeshan
>
>
>
